root.name: Star Goose
root.description: In Star Goose you control a space ship and you have to collect six coloured gems on each level to advance to the next. Sounds easy but there are mines, turrets and other space ships out there trying to stop you. To help you on the way to victory you have guns, missiles and shields. Shields, ammo and fuel can be recharged as you go by entering the correct tunnel mini game.
